attributes.action: Members of Parliament and high paid public servants must cut their wages by 50%
attributes.additional_details: The action i want the government to take is to cut all MPs and high paid public servants wages by 50% and for any MPs which refused to expect their pay cut should be banned from being a MP as it shows they do not care about the people. Also MPs should be leading by example with the cuts to public spending by cutting their wages by atleast 50% and same with the high paid public servants who get over paid and then it shows they really care about the people of the U.K.

rejection.details: MPs wages are a matter for the House not for government
